title: Basics
description: Master fundamental sewing techniques including tools, fabric cutting, machine sewing, and essential hand stitches that form the foundation of all your future projects.

title: Seams
description: Learn professional seam finishing techniques including French seams, pin hems, flat felled seams, and various binding methods to give your garments a polished, haute couture finish.

title: Zippers
description: Conquer your fear of zippers with three essential techniques: covered zips for a seamless look, exposed zips for a modern edge, and invisible zips in French seams for that professional finish.

title: Shapes
description: Create beautiful details with straps, rouleaux, belts, collar corners, curves with binding, piping, and mitred corners. Plus learn about corset boning for structured garments.

title: Pockets
description: Add functional and beautiful pockets to your garments. Learn rounded pockets, lined pockets, side pockets in French seams, and the elegant Dior flap pocket technique.

title: Fabric Manipulation
description: Transform plain fabric into works of art with lace applique, 3D applique, gathered frills, pintucks, pleats, and flares. These techniques add dimension and interest to any garment.

title: Bonus: Chanel Skirt
description: Put all your skills together in this comprehensive bonus module where you'll create your very own classic Chanel-style skirt from start to finish.
